Childbirth is a complex process, and it is essential to remember to provide everything 
that is needed to ensure both the mother and newborn child receive the safest care 
possible. Checklists are useful tools to organize such complex, and important processes 
â€” they have long been used to prompt users to remember essential tasks to deliver 
better and safer care in a variety of settings.1,2
